title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the VirtualSurgeonAI platform, including features, functionalities, and target users.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the VirtualSurgeonAI platform, including components, data flow, integration points, scalability considerations, and security measures.
dependencies: Gather and Analyze Real Patient Data

title: Develop Virtual Reality Environment
description: Implement the virtual reality environment for surgical simulations, including rendering, physics, and user interactions.

title: Integrate Patient Data
description: Develop mechanisms to securely import and process real patient data for use in surgical simulations.

title: Implement Surgical Procedure Modeling
description: Develop algorithms and models to accurately simulate complex surgical procedures based on patient data.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for surgeons to interact with the VirtualSurgeonAI platform, considering different user roles (e.g., surgeons, instructors, students), accessibility requirements, and integration with existing medical software/hardware.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to strict security and privacy standards for handling sensitive patient data. This includes implementing robust encryption, access controls, auditing mechanisms, and compliance with relevant regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a robust CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the VirtualSurgeonAI platform.

title: Create Testing and Validation Framework
description: Develop a comprehensive testing framework to validate the accuracy and reliability of surgical simulations.

title: Document and Provide Training Materials
description: Prepare detailed documentation and training materials for surgeons and other users of the VirtualSurgeonAI platform.
